name: Grandpa's Videogames For Knuckleheads
description:
Default Controls
  • Use the mouse to navigate the menu and play the microgames.
Story

Grandpa has caught Soap Opera disease and only has one year left to live. Before he joins Mrs. Grandma in the sky, he vows to reconnect with his grandson though video games.

Created for the "Games for GrandmaGrandpa" Awfuljam, 2016.

Help
  • At 11+ microgame wins your chance to gain stats is maxed. if you want to continue the story, just stop at 11 wins and retry.
  •  Studying, Exercising, and Resting do not alter stats directly, they improve your chance to gain stats while you practice.
  • There are three endings.
Credits Game
  • Systemlogoff - You can also reach me via eMail.
Music
  • Willfor - Who does his own projects as well.
